column4: is there a way to find the file you just installed via tar.gz
i did make file and and then it made dir (?) what do i need to do now?
go into that directory and poke about. :-)
turn out i did all the work to find out the file is .exe grrrh
Well, you've now had a learning experience. :-)
ok i found it as a package (should have looked into that) but is there a way to find it?
yes.  the "find" command.  It is *extremely* powerful.
i typed that into the command line and it show crazy stuff. is there a gui one
ok thanks for your help! ( i found the command line to run the package i installed!!!)
what was the command you used?  "dpkg -i"?
negative. it was the file name (i used synaptic)
